languages.text: "Так не бывает, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Ты выбираешь себе или одного врага, или заполучаешь сразу обоих!" {n}Оскал Винтерскейла становится шире с каждым словом.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Так не бывает, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}. Ты выбираешь себе или одного врага, или заполучаешь сразу обоих!" {n}Оскал Винтерскейла становится шире с каждым словом.{/n}

languages.text: "It does not work that way, new blood. You either pick one enemy or have to deal with both!" {n}Winterscale's grin is growing wider with every word.{/n}

languages.text: «Así no funcionan las cosas, {mf|novato|novata}. ¡Si no eliges un enemigo, tendrás que enfrentarte a ambos!». {n}La sonrisa burlona de Winterscale se va ensanchando con cada palabra.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It does not work that way, new blood. You either pick one enemy or have to deal with both!" {n}Winterscale's grin is growing wider with every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Así no funcionan las cosas, {mf|novato|novata}. ¡Si no eliges un enemigo, tendrás que enfrentarte a ambos!». {n}La sonrisa burlona de Winterscale se va ensanchando con cada palabra.{/n}

languages.text: “这可不行，新来的。你要么选择其中一方当你的敌人，要么同时对付我们两方！”{n}温特斯凯尔每说出一个字，他的笑容就灿烂一分。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It does not work that way, new blood. You either pick one enemy or have to deal with both!" {n}Winterscale's grin is growing wider with every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这可不行，新来的。你要么选择其中一方当你的敌人，要么同时对付我们两方！”{n}温特斯凯尔每说出一个字，他的笑容就灿烂一分。{/n}

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas comme ça que ça marche, novice. Soit vous choisissez un ennemi, soit vous affrontez les deux ! » {n}Le sourire de Winterscale s'élargit à chacun de ses mots.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It does not work that way, new blood. You either pick one enemy or have to deal with both!" {n}Winterscale's grin is growing wider with every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ça ne marche pas comme ça, novice. Soit vous choisissez un ennemi, soit vous affrontez les deux ! » {n}Le sourire de Winterscale s'élargit à chacun de ses mots.{/n}

languages.text: 「そうはいかないんだ、新たな血よ。どちらかの敵を選ぶか、両方を相手にするかだ！」{n}ウィンタースケールの笑みは、言葉を重ねるごとに大きくなっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It does not work that way, new blood. You either pick one enemy or have to deal with both!" {n}Winterscale's grin is growing wider with every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そうはいかないんだ、未熟者。どちらかの敵を選ぶか、両方を相手にするかだ！」{n}ウィンタースケールの笑みは、言葉を重ねるごとに大きくなっている。{/n}

languages.text: "So funktioniert das nicht, neues Blut. Entweder wählt Ihr einen Feind oder Ihr müsst mit beiden fertigwerden!" {n}Winterzunders Grinsen wird mit jedem Wort breiter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It does not work that way, new blood. You either pick one enemy or have to deal with both!" {n}Winterscale's grin is growing wider with every word.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "So funktioniert das nicht, Grünschnabel. Entweder wählt Ihr einen Feind oder Ihr müsst mit beiden fertigwerden!" {n}Winterzunders Grinsen wird mit jedem Wort breiter.{/n}

languages.text: "O iş öyle yürümüyor taze kan. Ya bir düşman seçersin ya da ikisiyle birden başa çıkmak zorunda kalırsın!" {n}Winterscale'in sırıtışı, söylediği her bir sözle yüzüne daha da yayılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It does not work that way, new blood. You either pick one enemy or have to deal with both!" {n}Winterscale's grin is growing wider with every word.{/n}
